website_summaries.verdict: This loveable turtle walks on dry surfaces and swims in the water, so your child can play everywhere, from tank to tub.
pros: Sandy can swim in the water and walk on land
Comes with tank and two friends who can ride on the shell
Takes one AAA and one LR03 battery, not included
cons: It's a bit small, and its friends are even smaller
Could pose a choking hazard for smaller children

customer_reviews.title: Lightening Deal
customer_reviews.text: Got this on a lightening deal, and my daughter absolutely loves it. She carries the baby dragon everywhere and keeps its cage at the end of the bed. It’s cute watching the dragon “hatch”, which it can do over and over again. And she thought it was hilarious that it could actually kick the cage door open to escape. Lol. We got this at Christmas time and she’s still playing with it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this little turtle. Those were dashed when I opened it up to discover I could not get the screws out to put the battery in. The screws were totally misshapened. I tried every small screwdriver in the house. Neither screw budged at all. If 1 screw was messed up, I can almost understand that. BOTH screws!?! That tells me there are a lot more out there messed up. Now I have an upset grandson, which means there is an upset mimi.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Clements

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money; didn’t work out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an Easter gift for my son but when he got it on Easter, the batteries were already dead. I was able to open the battery case using an eyeglasses repair kit, but haven’t gotten batteries to replace them with yet. It takes LR44 batteries. I am so irritated that I bought this and now have to spend more money to replace batteries and he didn’t even get to play with it yet. The return “window” has already passed of course. 🙄
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Batteries Dead
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my daughter for her birthday but the batteries were dead. It was supposed to hatch but instead I had to pry out and replace batteries. Very anticlimactic. Now I have to order batteries to replace the ones I took from another toy.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore A Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Dragon is cute, noisy though
customer_reviews.text: The dragon is cute, it works as it should, and my daughter likes it. She tends to turn it on and set it down to hop around somewhere she can leave it and not listen to it’s noises. The main con is that when it screeches and I’m in a different room it sounds like an upset/hurt cat and I run to find out what happened. Otherwise, i’d give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kagurarisa

customer_reviews.title: My daughter takes puppy, ‘Cutie’ everywhere we go!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter saw one of her friends had one of these so of course she wanted her own ;) My daughter is also an animal lover so this toy really fit the bill. I like the carrying case because my daughter can carry it like a purse and take it with us as we run errands. It’s a great inexpensive gift and my daughter loves her new puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Fit Dad

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for toddler
customer_reviews.text: My oldest daughter bought one of these and my toddler kinda stole it from her so I purchased her one as well. She loves her little puppy. She takes her everywhere she goes
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: HUGE hit at Easter!!
customer_reviews.text: We colored and hunted eggs, then found an easter basket THEN found THIS left behind by the Easter Bunny for my granddaughter! She squealed with delight as she heard the chirps of the mystery chick trying to hatch. The egg popped open and out jumped the cutest little chick!!! She picked it up immediately and said "Awwwwwwwww", holding it to her cheek!! The greatest part of this is that she can put the chick back in the egg and re-hatch it as much as she'd like!! The carry case is great to keep her chick happy and safe!!
customer_reviews.author: Diana L. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work at all!
customer_reviews.text: We did everything the instructions told us to- pulled tab, pealed tape, made sure the bird was ON. It wouldn't do anything more than chirp twice. Even waited 5 minutes! The bird never popped out of the egg, never hopped, NOTHING. All it will do is chirp twice, then nothing. We've tried multiple times with no results. My daughter is crying, she's so upset. And it's not like we can run back to the store quickly and get another one. She saved up for this. Major let down. Buy it at Walmart instead!
customer_reviews.author: Kate E.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother, child will just be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Child opened it up and it doesn’t work. I thought it might be the battery, but the screw to the battery compartment is so tiny that even a miniature screwdriver designed specifically for use on toys is too big for the tiny screw. Thanks for ruining my kid’s Easter with this crappy toy.
customer_reviews.author: Eatyrvegs

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself the aggravation... DO NOT ORDER THIS!! Does not work! The reviews tell all!
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME!!!! I ordered for my niece for her birthday. She was so excited to open this, but within minutes she became tearful d/t a defective product! The chick never hatched. It never hopped, it never made a noise. It was a total let down!! I ordered a replacement.... and the second one had the same disappointing outcome as the first one! Sent back again and got refund. What a waste! Please take this out of your inventory. The batteries are dead on all of these! The reviews speak for themselves and I am mad at myself for not listening to them to begin with! Do yourself a favor and DO NOT ORDER THIS ITEM!!
customer_reviews.author: Have.2.Have.It

customer_reviews.title: No color option
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew, who looooves turtles, but when you order, you don't get to pick the color of the turtle that is delivered. He was really happy about the turtle but VERY disappointed about it being pink..... Very big drawback, and I think he's going to give it to his sister, despite our trying to convince him pink could be for boys too... so just be aware that you don't get to pick your color turtle when you order.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: *BUYER BEWARE* BUY Batteries at the same time, or have plenty LR-44's on HAND!!!
customer_reviews.text: Needed to Return the first one as not only were the batteries weak out of the box but when I put new batteries in it still didn't work! The replacement wasn't much better, it just needed new batteries! I shouldn't have to immediately replace batteries for a giftable toy. Upon inspection of batteries, they were bulging and looked like they were about to explode!
customer_reviews.author: FogCityGardener

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughters birthday, along with an additional dragon egg. Neither worked. Both had old corroded batteries inside. Amazon sent a replacement for both items... SAME THING HAPPENED. I have no idea how long these were sitting on a shelf, but it's been awhile. Disappointing and upsetting for the kiddo. Trying to decide if it is worth cleaning out and replacing the batteries, or just sending it back and be done with it. :(
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Dead Batteries
customer_reviews.text: My little girl was so excited to see this in her Easter basket. Unfortunately, the batteries were dead brand new out of the package. Of course it requires like an eyeglass screwdriver to open the battery compartment. Luckily I had one of those. But I had to order more batteries. Hard to explain to a 3 year old that she has to wait.
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Cute toy; bought 2 so each of my kids could have their own in their Easter baskets. They were excited for the egg to hatch and watch the chick bounce around...until we opened the package. Then it was a huge let down for them. They were disappointed that the egg "hatched" before we could even remove the plastic tab protecting the battery, so the surprise was ruined. Then we couldn't get the egg back together again so they could watch it hatch. And on top of it, the batteries didn't work in either of them. The kids were so sad and ended up throwing them aside. If I hadn't bought them so long ago, I'd try to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have extra batteries
customer_reviews.text: We bought 1 as a gift and the batteries did not work so I returned for a new one. The new one came, and same thing happened, then the handle on the cage was not there. We replaced the batteries in this one, it was easier than exchanging. I complained and was sent a 3rd one, and again, the batteries do not work. Just be prepared to have extra LR44 batteries to replace....once new batteries are in, the toy lasts a long time!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bookfan

customer_reviews.title: Live Chick, isn't so lively.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the other "Live pet chick" because it said this was a newer version, and the other "chick" needed to be replaced because it didn't work. Sad to say, I was disappointed again because this too didn't work out of the box, the live chick, couldn't even pop out of its egg shell, all it did was make chirping sounds for 5 secs and that was it. Regrettable Buy and waste of money for a Christmas present that didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: SeReNiTy

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: These are the coolest little things. My son is obsessed with the turtles moving. We had one and he took it into the bath (which is supposed to be safe) and it stopped working shortly afterwards. I did change the batteries and am not sure if it was my fault. We bought this one to replace it and he's had fun so far
customer_reviews.author: ShepherdMomTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Battery dead so it didn't work
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty disappointing for your daughter when the brand new animal doesn't hatch because the manufacturer cheaps out the battery, or the amazon seller is selling an old product. I ordered batteries on amazon now, but have had to waste and addition $6 in doing so . Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey S Spatz

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two for Easter baskets and both were a bust. The one didn't work from the get go and opening the battery spot is virtually impossible without breaking it. The other worked for about 5 minutes, and even after following instructions, never worked again. A total disappointment for my little ones.
customer_reviews.author: nicole kramer

customer_reviews.title: Not working out of the package
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I bought these as gifts for my kids and one of them isn’t working. I changed the batteries and still nothing. I have a sad little kiddo. The toys are cute but the disappointment isn’t worth it
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.text: This item was returned. There was nothing "wrong" with the item as far as I know. I did not open the box. I had bought it as a gift for my grandchild but decided to return it. It did not look like it would be a fun toy other than maybe in the bathtub. Also, I felt it was overpriced once I actually received it and saw it up close. I'm leaving 4 stars for these reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy V

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift for 4 year old animal lover
customer_reviews.text: The toy itself was a big hit with a 4 year old girl. Only bummer was ours came with no handle and we didn't have time to return for a different one. Otherwise would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bye Bye Birdie
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I would give it absolutely no stars if I could. I don't know why I didn't listen to the previous reviews. This did not work. At all. It didn't hatch. It didn't hop. It chirped once and then slipped into the abyss. It was part of my 2 year old's Easter basket - was she mildly disappointed? for a nanosecond. Did my husband find it amusing watching a grown woman try to hatch a sparkly purple egg for 5 minutes? absolutely. Don't waste your time. Don't waste your money. "Chirp Chirp" now resides somewhere inside the playground that is my daughter's room.
customer_reviews.author: katelyn ashley

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money. Total junk
customer_reviews.text: Daughter was super excited to get this. Played with it for about done hours over the first three days. Did not touch or for a free weeks. Went back today and it does not work. Changed batteries. No good. Took it apart and moved mechanism by hand to "get it going" and it worked for 5 minutes. Total and complete junk.
customer_reviews.author: AJWKM

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and fun.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on sale for a great price for my daughters 8th birthday. She loves the little dragon and how it hatches from the egg. It hops out of the cage and does little movements. She has a few of these in various colors and loves playing with them all!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be cute for Easter but it was a total let down. I like most of the Little Live Pets but neither I nor my daughter were impressed by this. It’s tiny, not very cute and came with dead batteries. Buy the dragons instead.
customer_reviews.author: Truth

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: This worked fine upon opening, the batteries didn't last long, but can be replaced. Its really cute. My two year old got it for her birthday, she really enjoyed it!
customer_reviews.author: My Redeemer Lives

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a warehouse deal and when I received it, you could clearly see it had been opened and used. Not sure how this even passed inspection. Low and behold it doesn't even seem to work. I bought this in September for Christmas so it's my fault for not checking. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Keating Family

customer_reviews.title: Batteries dead
customer_reviews.text: I have seen that others had this issue, I wanted to say that we did too. The batteries do not work. Apparently they might not even be the right type (from the manufacture, how does that happen!?!?!?!?!) It was a Christmas gift, and it did not work.
customer_reviews.author: MomOfTwoAndMore

customer_reviews.title: Don't work
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and it didn't work. I changed the batteries and it still didn't work. I returned it and had them resend me another one. The 2nd one didn't work either. I'm not sending it back because my granddaughter likes to play with the chick even though it doesn't do anything. Expensive little chick! Must be old toys, sitting somewhere for awhile....
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Lowrey

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas and it was broken so very disappointing! My daughter was so upset it didn’t work at all...I bought Two hopefully the other one worked I gave it as a gift
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne E.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The chick wouldnt hatch out and it does not peep at all when its head is rubbed
customer_reviews.author: Monica R. Porter

customer_reviews.title: BATTERIES ALREADY DEAD
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE!!! I bought THREE of these for Easter gifts to my kids and not one of them worked!!! Batteries were already dead on them all. Super disappointed. Return window is closed and would have to order those tiny batteries to SEE if that would even make them work. 😡
customer_reviews.author: Cale Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Arrives without working batteries
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these. Both of them came with dead batteries. My kids were excited to get these, but were instantly disappointed because they didn't work. The batteries are $7.50. So, add that to your cost and your order when you buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Autobahn

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT Work on Christmas Morning
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed with this product. It was a gift from Santa that they wanted most and it did not work. They were so excited to set it up. We waited and waited for the chick to hatch and it did not. We are hoping it was just an issue with batteries, but so disappointing to kids on Christmas morning!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Svoronos

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in January for an Easter Gift for my sons and my niece. The 2 for my sons don’t work at all, they won’t “hatch” we were able to open the eggs up but and the chicks are supposed to chirp in response to being “pet” and that’s not working either. I tried restart them in case they were in “sleep mode” but still not working. I haven’t been able to give my niece hers yet (social distancing) so I’m not sure if hers works or not, yet, but I don’t have high hopes. I would return them if I wasn’t out of my return window since they were ordered in January.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased for Easter for both of my daughters. Neither one out of the 2 I purchased, worked. Did not hatch, chirped but then didn't after a few. They are heart broken. And it's not letting me return it because I bought it ahead of time and it's past the return window.
customer_reviews.author: TracyS

customer_reviews.title: Worked once,batteries died
customer_reviews.text: Love it,but batteries only lasted for one hatching! Daughter is disappointed,wont work. Now I need to buy button batteries. Thought it would have lasted at least all of Christmas day.
customer_reviews.author: alissa johnson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Opened these on Easter and they didn’t hatch. Chick doesn’t do anything. Came with dead batteries.
customer_reviews.author: KMurphy

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This NEVER worked. It never made a sound and never hatched. Even after putting new batteries it didn’t turn on. I tried to buy this 4 times and in all FOUR tries, it never worked!
customer_reviews.author: Samanthaaa

customer_reviews.title: Dead Batteries
customer_reviews.text: After buying a 2nd of these, and BOTH dragons not working, I took it upon myself to troubleshoot, and low and behold, the batteries were dead. Had to purchase new batteries, and the toy worked just fine! The toy even had a tab that should have blocked the battery from being used before opening, but clearly that didn't help.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cera

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money 😭
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. After realizing it does absolutely nothing I tried getting new batteries, which I cant even find anywhere, and I cant get the back off of the chick to even replace them anyway. Extremely dissapointed!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rode

customer_reviews.title: Do not do it.. worthless product.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible disappointment. The batteries were dead and the screw was stripped so they couldn’t even be replaced. Not worth a penny!! Cheaply made, I do not recommend at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki H

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter for Christmas was very disappointed it did not work at all. Even after all steps were read and then followed in order. Had a very upset child Christmas morning.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy for young kiddies
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two sets of these adorable puppy dogs for my granddaughters who are ages 4 and 6 and they loved them! They liked the fact that the little carrier is also a little play area for the puppies. Great gift and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The little Dino won’t hatch Or move ... it makes a wired noice and I’m not sure if is the batteries not working or what’s wrong with it because I cannot find these batteries at any store ! 🤷🏻‍♀️ My daughter is very disappointed. We can’t make a proper review until we can get it to work properly! Other than that, it’s cute and it came in perfect shape!
customer_reviews.author: Cintia Smoilis

customer_reviews.title: Dead batteries
customer_reviews.text: This toy would’ve been exactly what my daughter wanted if it was working. She spent 90 minutes reading instructions and trying to get it to work only to find out that the batteries were dead.
customer_reviews.author: D.Rubio

customer_reviews.title: Eh. Short lived toy
customer_reviews.text: Entertaining for maybe a day. My 2 year old liked it a little longer than my 5 year old. Novelty wore off quickly, it hatches numerous times but that is it
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Exciting gift for my young granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chick for my granddaughter for Easter (in lieu of added sugary sweets :) and she was delighted! She has one of the Little Live Pets cats and loves it! This was also a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Janet McCaskill

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: WARNING!!! DON’T BUY THE CHICK!! I got a replacement for the first one and neither work. The batteries they come with are dead and you have to have button batteries to replace them. Such a disappointment for a 7 year old on Christmas morning!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: 7 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old absolutely loves this. She has watched the chick hatch over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Angela H.

customer_reviews.title: Dead batteries
customer_reviews.text: The toy is very cute and my daughter loves it. Unfortunately, it came with the batteries dead and the toy wouldn't work. I switched out the batteries for brand new ones, and it worked just as it should have. I have also recently bought the same toy from Walmart and also had the same issue. Note to parents when buying this toy, go ahead and have three LR44 batteries on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not very exciting.
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't work nearly as well as it was intended. I was pretty disappointed in the performance of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cohpai

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I’m so incredibly disappointed in this toy. The batteries came barely working and the toy never hatched like it said it was supposed to. My daughter has waited for this treat for being so good during this quarantine mess. She was so happy with it, even defective. I on the other hand am very disappointed. Won’t be ordering from you again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this little live pets chick egg with the incubator for a few months now because it was for my daughter’s birthday party today she opened it her and her cousins we’re excited to see how it worked because she has the little live pet birds that sing in the check won’t do anything my daughter cracked the egg herself but it won’t talk it’s not even working at all
customer_reviews.author: Amber Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with either dead batteries or defective
customer_reviews.text: Very excited little grand-daughter with a gift that she was thrilled to unwrap, but it did nothing... no sound, no action. I thought maybe someone returned it after Christmas and after they had depleted the batteries - so I ordered a second SAME THING - no sound no action. Very disappointed. Makes me want to avoid shopping Amazon - this happens SO MUCH now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 3yo daughter who loves dragons. It’s sooooo cuuuute!!! It was definitely a hit! We bought two extra dragons to go with it; all 3 for in there perfectly. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa G

customer_reviews.title: Batteries were dead
customer_reviews.text: Got the baby chick for my daughters potty present. After opening it tonight and spending a few minutes trying to figure out why it wasn’t working we realized that the batteries we dead. I got it on sale for less than 10$ and we had to go out and spend another 13$ on the batteries it needed. Pretty disappointed it came with dead batteries. But other than that my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my niece who is obsessed with dragons and she absolutely loves it. Didn't even want to keep opening other presents lol
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Kind of disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son as “practice” for getting a pet and a reward for potty. He loved it when he opened it but is very disappointed that it’s not hopping around and breaking out of the egg. It will make some noise and has done a couple hops but that’s it. After reading some other reviews it seems like I might need new batteries. Will try it with new batteries but going to return it if it doesn’t do anything more with the new batteries in.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: This egg is cracked no good
customer_reviews.text: Cute little chicken the egg hatched and nothing. It did not respond at all. So we replaced the batteries and still nothing. My 5 year old said just throw it in the trash this toy does not work. We were so excited about this one it was a huge let down.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B. White

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Have to give this 1 star. Our first dragon came and never would hatch or hop around. Ordered a second and it did the same. Followed all directions. Returned both.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Batteries dead upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that when I purchased a brand new toy that the batteries were already dead. Not sure if it is the batteries or if it is defective, bc I did not have the size battery on hand. For a $25 toy, you would think quality check would make sure it actually worked before sending it out.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Pannell

customer_reviews.title: Ages 4 & over
customer_reviews.text: Not the greatest toy I’ve ever purchased. It had several small pieces that I had to throw away . It’s cute and works correctly. It was a great price. Good for older children.
customer_reviews.author: Double_trouble22

customer_reviews.title: Order batteries too
customer_reviews.text: Came with batteries dead. On top of that, the 3 dead batteries were so stuck in the toy, it took pliers to pull them out.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Cool Interactive Toy for 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun interactive toy! I was hesitant at first because it seemed boring and a one time thing however you’re able to “reset” the egg over and over and watch it hatch.
customer_reviews.author: awarnke

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this as a gift for our son and did not open the package until after the return window closed. Unfortunately, the package was clearly opened previously, masking tape was used to reseal the packaging, and the entire apparatus: chicken, egg, and cage do not work. We switched out the batteries, and it still does not work. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jdub2k12

customer_reviews.title: Little Live Pets....
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really enjoyed this gift. Wished it did a little more as she goes through periods of enjoying playing with it, then being bored with it.... But I was very happy with the price and what came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tam P

customer_reviews.title: Dead batteries included
customer_reviews.text: Just received it a few hours ago. This is a present for my daughter’s birthday. Batteries that were included are dead. See pic. Tested all 3 and all are dead batteries. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Yong

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work. Cheap.
customer_reviews.text: It cracked open but the chick doesn’t hop or sing. Big disappointment for Easter morning. A ton of packaging so you can’t check that it works beforehand.
customer_reviews.author: David Murdza

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in August 2019 and saved to give to my three and a half year old for Christmas. If I could give zero stars I would. After moving the switch to on and following the instructions it made a noise and then nothing. It won’t hatch and in my opinion is totally defective. And since I’m outside the return window, my daughter is stuck with a dragon that doesn’t do anything.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Hershberger

customer_reviews.title: dead batteries-bummed
customer_reviews.text: Very cute little dragon but super disappointing to have it not work out of the box. All of the excitement and then just disappointment. Driving all over town to find the replacement batteries and still no luck. Hoping once I actually find these batteries that when we put them in, the toy works. And hoping all of this happens in the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Keli B

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my daughter for Christmas. She loved it! Disappointed that it seemed not to work correctly once she opened it. Not cool to discover on Christmas morning. Turns out the batteries were almost dead. Works fine now that I replaced the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Hambone

customer_reviews.title: Defective x2
customer_reviews.text: We received the first one and it was defective, even after switching out batteries. Amazon replaced it and the second one was also defective and didn't work at all. Super disappointed. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: TheMays

customer_reviews.title: Needs new batteries and now it works!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time. It is a cute toy. Only problem is that it didn't work at first. We figured out it was the batteries that did not work. We put brand new batteries and the little toy hatched out of it's shell. She said it is the best pet ever. We don't have to feed it or take it to the vet. :) yeah
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Cameron

customer_reviews.title: These are cute
customer_reviews.text: These are but but our came with dead batteries, luckily I had some on hand to replace. Took us 15 minutes of playing around till we figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Very happy birthday girl
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my 7 year old daughters birthday. I was satisfied with the price and delivery was on time. My daughter was so happy and even more excited when we realized she got the limited edition rainbow winged bird.
customer_reviews.author: Jmenard87

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The little chicks chirps and you hear egg breaking but the chick never hops. Doesn’t move like it says it is suppose too.
customer_reviews.author: Tina P

customer_reviews.title: On to the third?
customer_reviews.text: What a let-down for a Valentine for my daughter. We are going on our third one. They all come with dead batteries
customer_reviews.author: T E

customer_reviews.title: Turtle stopped working after a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Kids were happy for Christmas but it hasn’t been played with for long enough for the turtle to stop working already. Changed the battery & still no sign of the turtle coming back to life.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer LeMaster

customer_reviews.title: Great buy thank u amazon
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these used through Amazon warehouse. All three came in perfectly brand-new condition absolutely nothing was wrong with them so I am beyond happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: ashley veld

customer_reviews.title: Only somewhat works
customer_reviews.text: Dragon did hatch upon opening and will hatch again as intended however that is all it does. Does not respond to petting and does move or make any other sound. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Easter Gift but Batteries Dead
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as an Easter gift for my 4 year old. We followed all directions and waited and waited for the chick to hatch. Sadly, it never did. The batteries must be dead and the Easter bunny didn’t leave extra batteries so...She liked the cage and just played with the chick but we would have liked to have the hatching experience we expected.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Reitzel

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed durable but I bought two and both didn't work. The chicks only made some noise, no hoping.
customer_reviews.author: Nelly

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my niece for her birthday and she loved it. Her 6 month old sister ended up taking over the toy. It is the babies favorite toy now! They hold up very well. The toys have been thrown around and covered in baby food several times and they are still functioning. We've also had them for months and have never had to worry about batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: Next time, add working batteries
customer_reviews.text: The bird was sent with dead batteries... it totally ruined it for my daughter who was anticipating the bird all day. Not cool
customer_reviews.author: gbemisola ogunrinde

customer_reviews.title: Dead batteries upon arrival!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Didnt work out of box. My daughter cried. Niw we have to pay MORE for batteries???? Very frustrating AMAZON!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gunngirl

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Good quality, good original packaging and just simply precious! Preschooler loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Delissa Coureton

customer_reviews.title: Little live pets
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted it for her birthday, and it was easier than buying her real turtle.Winning!
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod Chavana

customer_reviews.title: Chick arrived not working,
customer_reviews.text: My kids were so excited, then so disappointed when this item arrived. The check arrived not working from the start. Even took the battery out and put it back in case something got dislodged during delivery but still doesn't work. Ordered just a new chick and it arrived in a package that had been opened and taped back together and also not working!
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd dragon we bought that didn't work. The first one we returned. This is the 2nd we bought as a replacement. I wanted to return but my daughter asked if we could try new batteries. With the new batteries, it did work but pretty disappointing that a toy is sent with unworkable batteries and I had to spend an additional $8 to get it to work. Don't waste your money on this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: We received this toy AFTER my daughter's birthday, which it was supposed to come day prior and when she opened the toy to have the chick hatch..nothing happened. I followed all the directions to try to get it to work but the chick never worked. Ended up returning the item and didn't bother to get another due to other reviews with the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Brown

customer_reviews.title: Turtles walk on the land and swim in the water!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Christmas gift for my 7 year old. She loves how it can be used on land or in the water. The tank is so big you can add a turtle friend too. Bright and colorful lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: amy patton

customer_reviews.title: I purchased four of these and not one of them worked.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased four of these and not 1 of them worked and I had to send them all back. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany G

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what by granddaughter wanted, set up in water and all immediately!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, Grand Daughter loved it! Fast ship, great value.
customer_reviews.author: Norman E. Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Loose latch lets egg open on its own
customer_reviews.text: My three year-old has enjoyed having the dragon hatch over and over and playing with the dragon as it hops around the floor or table. However, it’s also frustrated her as the egg’s latch is loose and doesn’t stay closed between hatchings.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Adorable little chick!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves it! It's super adorable. I love the fact that the chick can hatch over and over.
customer_reviews.author: wgm14

product_meta.title: Little Live Pets - Turtle Tank - Sandy The Tropical Turtle
product_meta.description:
Style:TurtleLil’ Turtles are back again with gorgeous new shell designs that will really make a splash! They are the cutest lifelike pets that move and act so real! • Your pet turtle can swim in water and walk on land – just like a real turtle! • Each turtle is unique with cool shell designs that show off their personality! • Each Turtle has two cute little sea creature friends that attach to their shell! The little friends can ride wherever the grown up turtle goes! • Take us anywhere in our cool turtle tank! • Open the lid and watch us walk around them we dive into the water! Watch your turtle walk and swim so well as they carry their friends on their shell. • They are the Little Live Pets that love to get wet! WARNING: Choking hazard - Small parts. Not for children under 3 years WARNING: Requires 1 x AAA/LR03 Batteries. Hazardous if swallowed - See instructions (Batteries not included).

SET CONTAINS:
1 x Turtle 2 x Friends 1x Tank 1 x Instruction manual 1 x AAA/LR03 Battery (Not Included)
feature_bullets: Comes with 2 cute sea creature friends!
